original_title: ROBOMATION SUPER LIVE スーパーロボット魂VOL.1
overview: The recording of the first animation song Live event "Super Robot Spirits", which has become a popular event, finally made available on DVD. Enjoy 22 songs of gems such as "Mazinger Z", "Combattler V" and "Getter Robo" from the event on August 17, 1997.
title: ROBOMATION SUPER LIVE Super Robot Spirits VOL.1
